caseStudies.title: Cocktailer
caseStudies.description: Thirsty, and have various ingredients at home and want to try something new, check out the website for free directions on how to make a cocktails at home from expert bartenders from around the world, No matter if you are looking for a classic cocktails or an original mix. There is something for everyone and every occassion. Just shake, blend, stir and pour away.

caseStudies.tags: frontend development / psd conversion / web design
caseStudies.title: Fiasco Restaurant
caseStudies.description: We make alot of decisions in a single day and the more decisions we make the worse our decision making becomes. This site solves that but making your decision making easier by showcasing what the restaurant has to offer.

caseStudies.tags: frontend development / psd conversion / web design / real-estate
caseStudies.title: Evero Real Estate
caseStudies.description: This is a PSD Conversion whereby i converted the PSD template to its code equivalent with SEO, responsive design for mobile phones and a beautiful UI that wil keep clients coming back.

caseStudies.tags: frontend development / movies / API / social sharing
caseStudies.title: Movie App
caseStudies.description: A simple react movie app to search for latest movies from the movie db and added sharing functionalities to share with friends on facebook just by the click of a button.
